portrait.alt: Alchemist Mirelle surrounded by bubbling potions

message:
Welcome to my laboratory! The name's Mirelle.

While the Foundry focuses on permanent enchantments, I specialize in **potions and elixirs** - temporary but powerful effects.

Bring me herbs, crystals, and other reagents, and I'll brew you something special. Just... try not to knock anything over. Some of these mixtures are rather volatile!
